Interface Lookup

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public interface Lookup
extends java.io.Serializable

This interface represents a product lookup.

Version:
Summer 2013
Author:
Franklin University

Method Summary
 boolean matches(Product product)
          Return true if the given product matches our lookup criteria, false otherwise.
 

Method Detail

matches

boolean matches(Product product)
Return true if the given product matches our lookup criteria, false otherwise.

Parameters:
product - The product to be matched.
Returns:
true or false.
